title: This Item isn't Available in your country
body: Hi, I can't Install this app because it is not available!

replies.body: Aw, don't worry guys! We're going to continue rolling out the app to other countries over the next few weeks. It's coming soon (not Soon™).
Psst if you do Alt+0153 you get Soon™

> [{quoted}](name=Awkward Couch,realm=NA,application-id=J7eFAjsN,discussion-id=7M1kf6gw,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-02-25T21:48:12.550+0000)
>
> Psst if you do Alt+0153 you get Soon™

*whispers* Psst...or I could copy/paste yours....thanks man... >_>
